creator: echrisp@hotmail.com
text:
When you use the clonesheet method on the workbook the name of the sheet is 
defaulted to the name + "(2)" but if you clone the same sheet multiple times 
the names are not unique.
When you write out the Excel file shouldn't the workbook check for duplicate 
sheet names and change them to unique names. As my version of Excel would just 
hang at 100% cpu when opening the excel file when duplicate sheet names were 
used.
